title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 91.16 - Uniform traffic ticket (tsleandd area)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 91.16 - Uniform traffic ticket (tsleandd area)

State Regulations
(a) The commissioner shall issue uniform
traffic tickets to all enforcement agencies in the TSLE&D area. Such
tickets shall be the only traffic tickets to be used for arrests for, and
adjudication of, traffic violations in the TSLE&D area. Except as provided
in subdivision (b) of this section, each ticket packet shall consist of six
parts, as follows: (1)

Part I (UT
3.3)--Simplified Traffic Information. (2)

Part II (UT 3.4)--Certificate Concerning

Violation of Law Relating to Vehicles. (3)

Part III (UT 3.5)--Uniform Traffic

Ticket. (4)

Part IV (UT
3.6)--Arrest Record. (5)

Part V (UT
3.7)--Enforcement Agency Copy. (6)

Part VI (UT 3.8)--Officer's Copy. (b) Each ticket packet used in the Cities of

Buffalo and Rochester shall consist of six parts as follows: (1)

Part I (UT 1.3)--Simplified Traffic

Information. (2)

Part II (UT
1.4)--Certificate Concerning Violation of Law Relating to Vehicles. (3)

Part III (UT 1.5)--Traffic

Ticket. (4)

Part IV (UT
1.6)--Arrest Record. (5)

Part V (UT
1.7)--Uniform Traffic Ticket. (6)

Part VI (UT 1.8)--Officer's Copy. (c) The ticket packet provided in subdivision
(b) of this section may also be used in the Counties of Erie and Monroe by any
police agency which has jurisdiction in either county and also in the Cities of

Buffalo and/or Rochester and, other than a county within the City of New York
by any member of the State Police assigned to a State Police station located in

Erie, Monroe or Suffolk County. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
91.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
